description: The RCA Ampz Adjustable On-Ear Headphones feature a lightweight design for optimal comfort. With a form fitting design, they're sure to fit any size ear and reduce outside noise. With a powerful 40mm driver you get high-quality audio. They come in stylish colors that will fit anyone's style. Listen to your favorite music, without excess outside noise, and in style with the RCA Ampz Adjustable On-Ear Headphones.
title: RCA HP5041 Ampz On-Ear Headphones - Red/White
